name: Hyaluronic Mitt
about: What it is:A super soft self-tan applicator mitt..What Else You Need to Know:This super soft mitt delivers a flawless, streak-free tan every time, featuring a water-resistant barrier to prevent stained palms.u202fItu2019s reusable and machine washable so you can glow again and again.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use with your chosen Isle of Paradise product (sold separately)..-Dispense mousse, gradual, or instant tan directly onto mitt and sweep over the body for a streak-freeu202fapplication..-With Isle of Paradise Self-Tanning Water (sold separately), spray onto skin first and follow with mitt in sweepingu202fmotions
